sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import styled from 'styled-components'; const TemperatureStyle = styled.h1` font-size: 6em; `; const UnitStyle = styled.div` font-size: 1.5em; margin-top: 1em; `; const ListItem = styled.li` display: flex; justify-content: space-between; `; const IMG_SRC = "http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/"; const CardDetail = ({ selected_card, isToday, address }) => (
{selected_card && selected_card.dt && (

{isToday ? `Today` : new Intl.DateTimeFormat("en-GB", { weekday: "short", }).format(new Date(selected_card.dt_txt))}

{new Intl.DateTimeFormat("en-GB", { timeZone: "GMT", hour12: true, hour: "numeric", minute: "numeric", }).format(new Date(selected_card.dt_txt))}

{selected_card.main.temp} °C

{address}

Feels like {selected_card.main.feels_like}

    Humidity

    {selected_card.main.humidity}%
    Wind

    {selected_card.wind.speed} km/h

    {selected_card.rain && selected_card.rain["3h"] && (
    Rain

    Last 3h:{" "} {new Intl.NumberFormat("en-GB", { maximumFractionDigits: 2, }).format(selected_card.rain["3h"])}{" "} mm

    )}
    Maximun Temp.

    {selected_card.main.temp_max}°
    Minimum Temp.

    {selected_card.main.temp_min}°
    Pressure

    {selected_card.main.pressure} hPa

    Sea level

    {selected_card.main.sea_level} hPa

    Ground level

    {selected_card.main.grnd_level} hPa

    Wind

    Speed: {selected_card.wind.speed}m/s

)}
); export default CardDetail;
